author: bridge-bot
content: <ben_a_adams> One feedback on memory costs and why limiting is important, is it not just Blocks, but opens up a DoS attack on JsonRpc; as would potentially be running many eth_calls concurrently (doesn't mean it has to start expensive tho) (re @shemnon: quick notes on a possible paged memory costing model - https://hackmd.io/@shemnon/paged-gas-costing)

author: big_tech_sux
content: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9556 since danno said this could take some months for him to get time to investigate, i wanted to get moving on this so i've gone ahead opened an EIP for improving memory costs (paging <@403707149043105803> btw and lmk if you'd like to be added as a co-author)
